desc: All natural, crystal infused candles. Each candle is hand-poured with 100% soy wax and infused with naturally sourced crystals from Brazil and Madagascar. Our candles are perfect for relaxation, meditation, moon rituals, or just raising your vibration.

layout.text: • CRYSTAL INFUSED CANDLES • 100% SOY WAX • NATURALLY SOURCED CRYSTALS • ALL NATURAL SKINCARE
